item.title: Javascript Dice Game Project
item.description: NOTE: HTML and CSS were already configured when we did worked on the Javascript. Make your own version :). Dice Game — What we learned from this: How to create our fundamental game variables; How to generate a random number; “Math.random()” “Math.floor(Math.random() * 6) + 1” To get a random number between 1 - 6. How to manipulate the DOM; We can do DOM manipulations is the ‘document’ object.
